group_1.narration: There's a guy I really like.
We've been in the same@class since middle school.
His serious face during class,@his dedication to club activities,@his smile when talking with friends,@his sleepy look when he's reading.
I like so many things about him.
But the thing I probably like the most...
He put a finger to his mouth to be quiet@and gestured for me to come over.
He had something familiar in his hand.@A keychain...
It was a keychain that belonged to one of@the guys in our class. He loved that thing.

group_1.textRight: Uh huh. He told me he lost it.
I just happened to find it by chance.
It sounds like he doesn't want news to spread@that he lost it.
If I just put it in his desk, then he'll find@it on his own tomorrow, right?

group_1.narration: He cares about people in such little,@thoughtful ways...
He's kind, but never expects anything@in return.

group_1.textLeft: That's why I'm just sooo...[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:motion_100][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1][chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]head over heels@for him!
To tell the truth, he was barely even on my@radar before then.
But I just fell for him super hard!

group_1.textRight: Oooh! You're making my heart flutter!

group_1.textLeft: I totally respect you for understanding how@great Hayato is... [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]But listen here!

group_1.textRight: I didn't mean I like him too or anything.
It's just my first time talking about, uh,@romance?[chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_1][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1] So my heart's going crazy!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so that's what you meant.[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1] Isn't romance@talk the best?!
I usually just talk to myself about it, but@having someone else around is nice.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah! I want to start cheering just@listening to you!
Come on, tell me the rest!

group_1.textLeft: But...it gets a little tough to hear from here.
